nodes.text: Kelvin Ridge was a location on the planet Jakku.

After the First Order attack on Tuanul, the droid BB-8 fled, eventually running into the scavenger Rey who convinced a local Teedo to leave the droid alone. Rey then pointed BB-8 in the direction of Niima Outpost but warned him to stay off Kelvin Ridge.

Kelvin Ridge is named after J.J. Abrams's grandfather, whose first name was Kelvin. The director has used the name Kelvin in many of his projects: It appears as the name of a ship in Star Trek, as the intended recipient of a postcard intercepted by Tom Cruise in Mission: Impossible III, as the name of a chain of gas stations in Super 8, as the name of a character on Lost and as the name of a business on Fringe.
